nodes.text: The Making of Star Wars: Rogue Squadron III: Rebel Strike

The Making of  Star Wars: Rogue Squadron III: Rebel Strike is a documentary video that was included in the game Star Wars: Rogue Squadron III: Rebel Strike as an unlockable special feature, after the player beats the game or after the player uses a passcode to unlock it.

The documentary detailed the creation and method behind the development of Rebel Strike, as well as the process, supplied by the development team at Factor 5. It also included some footage with goofs made during development.
Despite Rebel Strike being rated "T for Teen" by ESRB, some of the footage of the development team has drinking bottles as well as a hand gesture resembling the middle finger being blurred out.
